tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MaintenanceRecords (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    component_id INT,
    lightbulb_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   item_id INT,
   date DATE,
   technician VARCHAR(50),
   notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE replacements (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   item_id INT,
   replacement_date DATE,
   reason VARCHAR(100),
   technician VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE LightBulbs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bulb_name VARCHAR(50),
    wattage INT,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE Components (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    component_name VARCHAR(50),
    type VARCHAR(50),
    unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    stock_quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bulb_id INT,
    component_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_personnel VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Replacements (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bulb_id INT,
    component_id INT,
    replacement_date DATE,
    reason VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE UsageLogs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bulb_id INT,
    usage_date DATE,
    usage_duration INT,
    usage_notes TEXT
)
